Name: Paula Radcliffe
Notes: First "World's Best" recognized by the International Association of Athletics Federations.[78] The ARRS notes Radcliffe's extended time as 2:17:17.7[9]

Notes: First world record for the women's marathon ratified by the International Association of Athletics Federations.[100] The ARRS notes Radcliffe's extended time as 2:15:24.6[9]
